projects.title: Pharmacy Customer Churn Prediction (McKesson)
projects.description:
Developed a classification model using Python (XGBoost) to identify pharmacies at risk of switching distributors based on order volume and complaint history.
Flagged 500+ at-risk accounts for the sales team, resulting in a 12% reduction in customer churn.
Protected approximately $2M in annual revenue by enabling proactive retention strategies.

projects.title: Marketing Mix Modeling (Uber)
projects.description:
Built a statistical regression model using Python and Azure Databricks to attribute ride bookings to specific marketing channels (Email, Push, Paid Ads).
Reallocated $500K in quarterly ad spend based on channel performance insights.
Increased Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) efficiency by 15% without reducing total booking volume.

projects.title: Retail Data Analytics
projects.description: End-to-end retail analytics project integrating Python and SQL for comprehensive data analysis, featuring sales trend analysis, customer segmentation, and inventory optimization insights.

projects.title: Data Pipelines with Airflow
projects.description: Automated data pipeline orchestration using Apache Airflow for ETL workflows, featuring scheduled data ingestion, transformation, and loading with monitoring and alerting capabilities.

projects.title: PDF Data Extraction
projects.description: Intelligent document processing system that extracts structured data from PDF files using Python, featuring text extraction, table parsing, and data validation pipelines.

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.description: Machine learning model to predict customer churn using classification algorithms, featuring feature engineering, model comparison, and actionable insights for retention strategies.

projects.title: Online Payment Fraud Detection
projects.description: Machine learning system for detecting fraudulent online transactions, implementing anomaly detection and classification models to identify suspicious payment patterns in real-time.

projects.title: F1 Data Analysis
projects.description: Comprehensive data analytics project exploring Formula 1 racing history from 1953-2020. Combines SQL queries with Tableau visualizations to analyze driver performance, lap times, and historical trends across 1,000+ races and 800+ drivers.
